name: Johnny_Horne%27s_nurse
text:
Johnny Horne's nurse
An unidentified nurse served as Johnny Horne's live-in caregiver in 1989.
Biography
On February 24, Johnny was in an agitated state, bashing his head against a dollhouse in his room. The nurse came downstairs and told his mother Sylvia that it might help if she talked to him, but Sylvia snapped at her that he wouldn't be able to understand why Laura Palmer wouldn't come to work with him that day.
Unsubstantiated sources identify the nurse as "Greta."
